page.title: 19Religion in Wootton Bassett
page.content: The churches in Wootton Bassett are {St. Bartholomew's and All Saints} Vicar _ Rev. B.R.Cooper, Curate _ Rev. J. Potter, Roughly 400 people attend each Sunday, Services 8.00, 10.00 am, and 6.00 pm. {The United Reformed} Minister _ Rev. Stella Beare, Roughly 20 _ 30 people each Sunday, Services 10.30 am. {The Methodist} Minister _Rev.A.Ward Jones. Roughly 188 people attend each Sunday. Services 10.30 am and 6.00 pm, {Sacred Heart Roman Catholic} Priest_Father N.J.Tranter The Parish Sisters_at the Convent, Roughly 250 people attend each Sunday Services 9.30 am and 6.00 pm.
